|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TC58BVG2S0HTA00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = AVM 555.88R-AC |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :4x4 MU-MIMO, 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0 :VDSL/ADSL2+ Modem (Annex B), DECT, Media Server
*''Two WLAN Mini PCIe Card: 800Mbps (2.4GHz) + 1733Mbps (5GHz)'' :"555.87R Rev 01" and "555.88R Rev 01" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Acelink EW-7955MN|Acelink EW-7955MAC|AVM}}
*{{boxmatrix|7580}} :CPU: VR10 @1GHz (Dual Core), Modem: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318, RAM: 512MB :mips34_512MB_grx5_dect446_5geth_2ab_isdn_nt_2usb_host3_2wlan11n
===Specifications=== :CPU: [[Lantiq (Intel)]] GRX550, WLAN: 2x [[QCA]] QCA9984 :PXB4583EL2000 (SLLK4) 2x @1.0GHz ([[MIPS 34Kc]]) :Flash: ''Toshiba'' TC58BVG2S0HTA00 (512MB NAND) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI (512MB DDR3) :xDSL AFE: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318 M V1.2 (XWAY VRX318) :FPGA: ''Xilinx'' Spartan XC3S100E; DECT: ''Dialog'' SC14446
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://maxwireless.de/2016/erster-eindruck-11-businessserver-avm-fritzbox-7580/ On '''MaxWireless''']
